channel.title: Homes on Wei Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Wei Yang

item.description: Biography I am an assistant professor in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Texas at Dallas. I teach and do research on software engineering and security. Current Focused Research Areas: Deployment of Deep Learning on the Edge (ILFO, EREBA, NICGSlowDown, NMTSloth, DeepPerform, EarlyAttack, AntiNODE, DyCL, SAME) Testing/Security for Deep Learning (PerInv, MRV, Telemade, NMTtest, DENAS, CorrGAN, TestAug) Mobile Security (WHYPER, Pluto, AppContext[1][2][3], Telemade, MRV, PERation,CLAP, EnMobile, MalScan, iRuler, TextExerciser, IntDroid, HomDroid, IFDroid )

item.title: Students

First Employment: J.P. Morgan AI Research Simin Chen (Jan 19-) 1 [FSE 2020] [CVPR 2022] [IJCAI 2022] [FSE 2022] [ASE 2022] [ICCV-W 2023] [CVPR 2023] [ACL 2023] [InterSpeech 2023] [ISSTA 2023] Simin is on the job market.
